groupItems.title: Engine Temperature Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates the temperature of the engine has exceeded normal limits. Next steps would be to check coolant level, fan operation, radiator cap, coolant leaks.

groupItems.title: Battery Charge Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates issues with the car’s charging system. There could be a shortage of power or an issue with charging. These issues involve the battery and or alternator.

groupItems.title: Oil Pressure Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates loss of oil pressure. Next step would be to check the oil pressure and level.

groupItems.title: Brake Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates the handbrake is on. When lit continuously, indicates either hydraulic pressure has been lost in one side of the brake system or the master cylinder fluid level is dangerously low.

groupItems.title: Transmission Temperature
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates the engine temperature has exceeded normal limits. Check coolant level, fan operation, radiator cap, coolant leaks.

groupItems.title: Tire Pressure Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates low tire pressure.

groupItems.title: Traction Control Off
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates deactivation of the vehicles traction control system.

groupItems.title: Steering Wheel Lock
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates lockage of the steering wheel. To diasble lockage, insert the key into the ignition and turn it to at least the first position while turning the steering wheel in either direction.

groupItems.title: Trailer Tow Hitch Warning
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the tow hitch is unlocked or that there’s an issue with the lighting system.

groupItems.title: Traction Control Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates when the vehicle TCS (traction control system) is activated.

groupItems.title: Service Vehicle Soon
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates when there is a fault condition in an area of the vehicle chassis systems such as—the anti-lock (ABS) brake system, the traction control (TCS) system, the electronic suspension system, or the brake hydraulic system.

groupItems.title: Security Alert
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates if the ignition switch is locked and will need the proper transponder-equipped key to restart.

groupItems.title: Side Airbag
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates a fault with the side airbag.

groupItems.title: Reduced Power Warning
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the Engine Computer has limited engine power output.

groupItems.title: Seat Belt Indicator
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that a seat belt has not been secured for a passenger in the vehicle.

groupItems.title: Press Clutch Pedal
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates to push the clutch.

groupItems.title: Powertrain Fault
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates when a powertrain or AWD fault has been detected. Contact your mechanic as soon as possible.

groupItems.title: Power Steering Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates if there is an issue with the power steering system, and will be disabled until fixed.

groupItems.title: Press Brake Pedal
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates to push the brake pedal.

groupItems.title: Parking Brake Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates park brake is on.

groupItems.title: Overdrive Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the vehicle’s overdrive system has been manually turned off.

groupItems.title: Oil Change Reminder
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates means that oil life has expired.

groupItems.title: Master Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that one or more warning systems have been detected.

groupItems.title: Information Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates will turn on when a new message is stored in the information display.

groupItems.title: Icy Road Warning Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates when the outside air starts to reach freezing temperatures, around 35°F or 3°C.

groupItems.title: Gas/Fuel Cap
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates an need for tightening of the gas cap.

groupItems.title: ESP Fault/Traction Control Malfunction
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that there is a malfunction with the vehicle’s traction control.

groupItems.title: Electric Park Brake
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates an issue with the electric parking brake.

groupItems.title: Distance Warning
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that a vehicle in front is too close or is being approached too quickly.

groupItems.title: Clogged Air Filter
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates reduced airflow to the engine.

groupItems.title: Child Safety Lock
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the child safety lock is in use.

groupItems.title: Check Engine or Malfunction Indicator Light (MIL)
groupItems.description: Dashboard light blinks to indicate the engine is turned. The light stays illuminated when a malfunction has been detected.

groupItems.title: Catalytic Converter Warning
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates the catalytic converter is either overheating or not operating properly.

groupItems.title: Brake Fluid
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates the brake fluid level is low.

groupItems.title: Brake Pad Warning
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the brake pads are worn.

groupItems.title: Brake Lights Warning
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates a malfunction with the exterior brake light bulb.

groupItems.title: Automatic Gearbox Warning
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates an issue with the gearbox/transmission.

groupItems.title: Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates an issue with in the ABS system.

groupItems.title: All Wheel Drive (AWD/4WD)
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates an issue with the 4WD system.

groupItems.title: Airbag Indicator
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the front airbag is off.

groupItems.title: Airbag Deactivated
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates an issue with the rear spoiler system.

groupItems.title: Adaptive Suspension Dampers
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates there is a maintenece issue that will need to be repaired by an authorized mechanic

groupItems.title: 4 Wheel Drive (4WD) LOCK Indicator Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the vehicle’s 4WD Lock mode is on.

groupItems.title: Air Suspension
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that there is leak or inflation problem with the air suspension bags.

groupItems.title: Low Beam Indicator Light
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the vehicles dipped beam is activated.

groupItems.title: Lamp Out
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that an exterior light of the car is not functioning properly.

groupItems.title: High Beam Light Indicator
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates the car’s high beam headlights are activated

groupItems.title: Headlight Range Control
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates an issue with the headlight range control system.

groupItems.title: Front Fog Lights
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates front fog lights are turned activated.

groupItems.title: Exterior Light Fault
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that an exterior light of the car isn’t not working properly.

groupItems.title: Auto High Beam
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the high beam headlights are in use.

groupItems.title: Adaptive Light System
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates  adaptive headlights are turned activated.

groupItems.title: Side Light Indicator
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the headlights are on.

groupItems.title: Rear Fog Lights Switched On
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates means rear fog lights are on.

groupItems.title: Rain and Light Sensor
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates there is an issue with the sensor system of the wipers and lights.

groupItems.title: Windshield Defrost
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the window defrost is on.

groupItems.title: Washer Fluid Reminder
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates if the windscreen washer fluid reservoir is almost empty.

groupItems.title: Rear Window Defrost
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the rear window defrost is on.

groupItems.title: Low Fuel Level
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the car is running low on fuel.

groupItems.title: Key Not in Vehicle
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates the key is not in the car.

groupItems.title: Hood/Bonnet Open
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the car hood is not closed.

groupItems.title: Hazard Lights On
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates hazard lights are on.

groupItems.title: Fan
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the internal ventilation is on.

groupItems.title: Door Ajar
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that one or more doors of the car are not shut.

groupItems.title: Direction/Signal Indicators
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that one of the turn signals has been turned on.

groupItems.title: Car on Ramp
groupItems.description: Dashboard light indicates that the vehicle is on a ramp/jack system.
